ComicInfo.Series: Mouse Guard: Legends of the Guard
ComicInfo.Summary:
Cursed ghosts, unrequited love, and dire peril abound as the stories continue in the common room of the June Alley Inn. Legends of the Guard continues the tradition of featuring handpicked artists and storytellers by series creator David Petersen with a full serving of of brilliant new art and epic tales from around the Mouse Kingdom.
Note: The digital edition (6/26/2013) for this issue was released a month before the print edition (7/31/2013).
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-29 19:58:04. [CVDB414001]
ComicInfo.Writer: Christian Slade, David Petersen, Jemma Salume, Rick Geary
ComicInfo.Penciller: Christian Slade, David Petersen, Jemma Salume, Rick Geary
ComicInfo.Inker: Christian Slade, David Petersen, Jemma Salume, Rick Geary
